definitions.definition: A thing that is extremely holy; used almost exclusively in Holy of Holies.
Dedicated to a religious purpose or a god.
definitions.example: I'm planning to visit the holy city of Jerusalem this Christmas.

definitions.definition: Morally perfect or flawless, or nearly so.
definitions.example: My grandmother is a very holy woman.

definitions.definition: Separated or set apart from (something unto something or someone else).
Set apart or dedicated for a specific purpose, or for use by a single entity or person.
Used as an intensifier in various interjections.
definitions.example: Holy cow, I can’t believe he actually lost the race!
